first_interaction.speaker: Charlie
first_interaction.text: Oh, hey! Ngayon lang kita nakita dito. May hinahanap ka ba?

first_interaction.speaker: Charlie
first_interaction.text: Kung gusto mong malaman ang daan o may kailangan ka, sabihin mo lang.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Charlie
repeated_interaction.text: Uy, balik ka na naman ah! May nakita ka na bang gusto mo?

repeated_interaction.speaker: Charlie
repeated_interaction.text: Huwag kang mahihiya, tanong ka lang kung may kailangan pa.
